titles.title: Goku`s New Move, Instant Transmission! The Three-Year Training Session Begins!
Gokus momentane Teleportation! – Hartes Training für in drei Jahren
Gokuu no Shinwaza, Shunkan`idou! 3-nengo ni Kaketa Tokkun

悟空の新ワザ, 瞬間移動! 3年後に賭けた特訓
